item.title: Tax impact on wealth giving season: Here's what to know
item.description: Changes to U.S. tax law could lead to a surge in charitable giving this year. CNBC's Robert Frank joins 'Squawk Box' with the details.

item.title: Manhattan condo values fell over the past decade. Here's why rents are still rising
item.description: More wealthy New Yorkers are choosing to rent as condos lose value in Manhattan.

item.title: How Byron Trott became the favorite banker of Warren Buffett and America's wealthiest families
item.description: Byron Trott has helped many of America's largest family-led companies grow from cash-starved startups to financial titans.
